description.en: A cloak made from the scales of an enormous dragon. It feels warm to the touch. Only the bravest of warriors could possibly have acquired it.
description.ar: A cloak made from the scales of an enormous dragon. It feels warm to the touch. Only the bravest of warriors could possibly have acquired it.
description.br: Uma Capa feita das escamas de um dragão. Aumenta todos atributos, velocidade de movimento e HP máximo.
description.cns: 用龙的鳞片堆叠而成的最高级披风,使用此披风的话从内心深处会散发出无比勇猛的威严
description.de: Der beste Umhang, welcher aus Drachenschuppen gefertigt ist. Sobald du ihn trägst fühlst du großen Mut.
description.fi: A cloak made from the scales of an enormous dragon. It feels warm to the touch. Only the bravest of warriors could possibly have acquired it.
description.fil: A cloak made from the scales of an enormous dragon. It feels warm to the touch. Only the bravest of warriors could possibly have acquired it.
description.fr: Une cape exceptionnelle créée à partir d'écailles de dragon qui confère un courage inébranlable à son porteur.
description.id: Jubah yang terbuat dari sisik naga raksasa. Terasa hangat saat disentuh. Hanya prajurit paling berani yang mungkin bisa mendapatkannya.
description.it: A cloak made from the scales of an enormous dragon. It feels warm to the touch. Only the bravest of warriors could possibly have acquired it.
description.jp: ドラゴンの鱗で作られた最高級のマント
description.kr: 용의 비늘로 수 놓아진 최고급 망토. 이 망토를 착용하면 마음 깊은 곳에서 부터 용맹함이 불끈불끈 솟아오른다.
description.nl: A cloak made from the scales of an enormous dragon. It feels warm to the touch. Only the bravest of warriors could possibly have acquired it.
description.pl: A cloak made from the scales of an enormous dragon. It feels warm to the touch. Only the bravest of warriors could possibly have acquired it.
description.ru: Плащ из шкуры исполинского дракона, теплый на ощупь. Такой трофей мог достаться лишь храбрейшему из воинов.
description.sp: Una capa hecha con las escamas de un enorme dragón. Se siente cálido al tacto. Sólo el más valiente de los guerreros podría haberlo adquirido.
description.sw: A cloak made from the scales of an enormous dragon. It feels warm to the touch. Only the bravest of warriors could possibly have acquired it.
description.th: เสื้อคลุมที่ทำจากเกล็ดมังกรขนาดมหึมา รู้สึกอบอุ่นเมื่อสัมผัส มีเพียงนักรบที่กล้าหาญที่สุดเท่านั้นที่จะได้มันมา
description.tw: 用龍的鱗片堆疊而成的最高級斗篷,使用此斗篷的話從內心深處會散發出無比勇猛的威嚴
description.vi: Một chiếc áo choàng làm từ vảy của một con rồng khổng lồ. Cảm giác ấm áp khi chạm vào. Chỉ những chiến binh dũng cảm nhất mới có thể có được nó.
